The Protection of Geryon

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 393
itemcost1 [itemcost1]: 100
monster must be present [monstermustbepresent]: #2277 “Geryon“ - Monster of Fraud
banish killer [banishkiller]: Inferno
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind])

Requires 30B to forge (B3)

With a sizable sacrifice, a deal with the demon lord Geryon is struck to ensure the protection of one individual. If the protected individual is killed, Geryon will immediately drag down the killer to Inferno. The deal only works if Geryon is in the Infernal Realms.
